column3: An array that holds the integers to be sorted, with a maximum size of 100.
The number of elements in the array that the user wants to sort.
Loop variable used for iterating through the array in various methods.
The index of the minimum value found in the array during the selection sort process.
Loop variable used for iterating through the array to find the minimum value.
A temporary variable used to swap elements during the selection sort process.
The index of the minimum element returned by the indexofmin method.
